title: Panner Butter Masala
ingredients: Paneer, Tomato, Cream, Butter, Onion, Ginger, Garlic, Spices, Salt
instructions:
1. Heat butter in a pan and saut\u00e9 onions, garlic, and ginger.
2. Add tomatoes and cook till soft.
3. Blend into a smooth paste.
4. Add cream, spices, and paneer cubes.
5. Simmer for 10 minutes and serve hot with naan or rice.
